functions.name: central_crosstab
functions.description: Create a contingency table showing the relationship between two or more variables

arguments.name: results_col
arguments.description: Column to count. Will be used as the columns in the contingency table

arguments.name: group_cols
arguments.description: One or more columns to group by. Will be used as the rows in the contingency table

arguments.name: organizations_to_include
arguments.description: Organizations to be included in the analysis

ui_visualizations.name: Contingency table
ui_visualizations.description: Contingency table that shows the relations between the requested variables for all nodes combined.

arguments.name: results_col
arguments.description: Column to count. Will be used as the columns in the contingency table

arguments.name: group_cols
arguments.description: One or more columns to group by. Will be used as the rows in the contingency table

ui_visualizations.name: Contingency table
ui_visualizations.description: Partial contingency table that shows the contingency table shared by this node.
